name: CMIOExtensionProperty
desc: A structure that defines the properties that providers, devices, and streams support.

items.name: static let providerName: CMIOExtensionProperty
items.desc: A property key for the provider name.

items.name: static let providerManufacturer: CMIOExtensionProperty
items.desc: A property key for the provider manufacturer.

items.name: static let deviceModel: CMIOExtensionProperty
items.desc: A property key for the device model.

items.name: static let deviceIsSuspended: CMIOExtensionProperty
items.desc: A property key for a Boolean value that indicates whether the device is in a suspended state.

items.name: static let deviceTransportType: CMIOExtensionProperty
items.desc: A property key for the device transport type.

items.name: static let deviceLinkedCoreAudioDeviceUID: CMIOExtensionProperty
items.desc: A property key for the UID of the linked Core Audio device.

items.name: static let deviceCanBeDefaultInputDevice: CMIOExtensionProperty
items.desc: A property key for a Boolean value that indicates whether the device can be a default input device.

items.name: static let deviceCanBeDefaultOutputDevice: CMIOExtensionProperty
items.desc: A property key for a Boolean value that indicates whether the device can be a default output device.

items.name: static let streamActiveFormatIndex: CMIOExtensionProperty
items.desc: A property key for the index of the active stream format.

items.name: static let streamFrameDuration: CMIOExtensionProperty
items.desc: A property key for the frame duration.

items.name: static let streamMaxFrameDuration: CMIOExtensionProperty
items.desc: A property key for the maximum frame duration.

items.name: static let streamSinkBufferQueueSize: CMIOExtensionProperty
items.desc: A property key for the sink buffer queue size.

items.name: static let streamSinkBuffersRequiredForStartup: CMIOExtensionProperty
items.desc: A property key for the number of buffers required for startup.

items.name: static let streamSinkBufferUnderrunCount: CMIOExtensionProperty
items.desc: A property key for the buffer underrun count.

items.name: static let streamSinkEndOfData: CMIOExtensionProperty
items.desc: A property key for a Boolean value that indicates whether the stream has more data.
